title: Rare find, Lrg Mission Home on great block 4+bd/3ba, pkg yd, pets
posting_body: Renovated Single Family Home Located on a quiet Mission block!
Available August 12, 2022
3D tour: https://real.vision/924-florida-street/
Property Summary:
Address: 924 Florida Street,  San Francisco CA 94110
Rent: $ 9,495/mo.
Bedrooms: 3 + 2 offices (or additional bedrooms)
Bathrooms: 3
Parking: 1 car garage prkg + 1 car in driveway
Approx Sq Footage: 2,450 sq ft
Property Type: Single Family Home (Unfurnished)
Floors: Wide Plank Hardwood
Laundry: Washer/dryer in unit
Pets: Pets Ok
Lease Term: 1 Year
Description:
Combing the best of the Victorian era with 21st century updates, this home lives like a dream!
Features include:
All 3 bathrooms were recently fully remodeled.
Kitchen very nicely remodeled a few years ago with high end appliances.
Rest of the house is fully updated as well.
Single Family Home on Three Levels
On the main level are the Formal Living Room with decorative fireplace, full of victorian details and charm.
Continue on to the dining room, which is open to the renovated kitchen.

The kitchen is a chef's dream with granite and butcher block counters, pantry storage, cool pot hangers over the island, a 5 burner range with pot filler faucet, super quiet dishwasher, large french door refrigerator and a microwave.
The sink has a pull out faucet, filtered water and a soap dispenser.
Past the kitchen is a mud room/pantry room with access to stairs leading to the yard.
Two bedrooms on this level include a master suite with designer bathroom.
A second fully redone bathroom completes this level.
A modern staircase with a skylight above leads you to the upper and lower levels.
Below you will find a garage with storage and laundry area and a large beautifully redone living space that consists of a kitchenette, large family / game room and the third bedroom and third bath.
This level has direct access to the street and the yard and can easily be used as separate guest suite if desired.
On the upper level are 2 large rooms with a spacious hallway/ loft in between.
Both of these rooms are currently used as offices but could be used as bedrooms if desired as well.
3 Bathrooms, One en-suite.
3-5 Bedrooms (depending on use)
Great for work from home setup with whole office- level upstairs.
Family / Game Room downstairs
Wide Plank Oak Flooring
Master bath with separate tub and shower.
Hand and Rain showerheads in shower and handshower in tub.
European style wall hung toilet.
Vanity cabinet with abundant storage.
Designer selected tile finishes.
Washer/Dryer in garage.
Smart home setup with Nest thermostat, doorbell, nest smart keypad locks and garage door camera.
Large garage with plenty of storage and 1 car parking + 1 Car Parking in driveway.
Private Rear Yard with lush landscaping and large covered patio.
beautiful sunny garden.
Nearly New BBQ grill included.
Very Sunny location on quiet Florida street block full of single-family homes.
Easy access to Hwy 101 & 280
